resources.string: It erases all the Wi-Fi configurations in your Android system. It is useful when you have a long list of remembered Wi-Fi and wants to erase ALL. The Android native system (at least so far 2.3.3) does not have an easy way to erase ALL. You must to erase one by one, and this is really sucks.
Are you sure that you want to erase %s Wi-Fi configurations?
Wow! You already have no Wi-Fi configurations! This is amazing! Click "OK" to close the APP, thanks for use! Good bye!
This is amazing! %1$s configs of %2$s was removed successfully. Press OK to close the APP.
